ExampleDefinition.Title: Chart Legends
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to create legends simple multi-series charts in code
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Chart Legends</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Generates a simple line chart with a chart legend. The Legend is created as follows:</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Adding a LegendModifier to the SciChartSurface.ChartModifier. This aggregates and exposes series data which you can bind to.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Adding a LegendControl to the chart, binding it to LegendModifier.LegendData.SeriesInfo.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic">Tip!</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic">You can create custom legends by binding to the SeriesInfo collection also. If you want to hear how to do this, ask us in our Support Forums.</Run>
